message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.NE 

This paper deals with the problem of continuous learning and adaptation in intelligent systems, which is a core topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Specifically, it proposes an online meta-learning algorithm that combines ideas from both meta-learning and online learning paradigms. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
